title: Baraj
overview: In this series adaptation of the 1977 movie with the same name, Nazım meets Nehir through an online dating website. The fact that they've never seen each other changes with Nehir posting a photo. Because of Nehir's insistence and fear of losing her, Nazim sends a picture of Tarık, a handsome and flirtatious young man who was banished from his colourful life of Istanbul to the dam construction. Nazim liking the photo of Tarık she's sent complicates things when he makes a surprise appearance.
